duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage delivery of projects of significant size and complexity involving software package implementation and custom development for clients.
Leverage expert knowledge across Project Management methodologies to coach and mentor the project team and produce high-quality, on-time, on-budget project deliverables.
Manage administration of assigned projects including project definition, project status reporting, project quality, and project staffing.
Use consulting skills, business knowledge, and package solution expertise to manage and deliver projects in a client environment.
Build and manage client relationships, establish policies, procedures, and plans.
Drive task level project plans that include requirements, communications, contracts, issue resolution, risk and resource management.
Lead review meetings, reporting, manage project budget and expenses.
Support the sales efforts of Asset Management related services.
Provide subject matter expertise regarding key decisions related to industry and/or functional area.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Management, or a related field (Master's preferred)
